docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican leaders of an influential House subcommittee indicated today that affluent Medicare beneficiaries were an early target in the hunt for savings in the insurance program for the elderly. But spokesmen for groups representing the elderly signaled that they would not yield without a fight to what one called, in an echo of past battles, a "seniors-only tax."

headline.main: Hunt for Savings Turns to Higher Costs for Affluent Beneficiaries of Medicare
